cgcloud__CP_Calculation_Schema_Step__c.name: cgcloud__CP_Calculation_Schema_Step__c
cgcloud__CP_Calculation_Schema_Step__c.description: This object stores the details of the relationship between calculation schema and pricing condition template that's used for the calculation steps that belong to a calculation schema.

cgcloud__Accrual__c.description: Defines whether the calculation step is an accrual step.

cgcloud__Base_User_Exit_Id__c.description: Unique identifier for the user exit that modifies the basis value of the calculation.

cgcloud__Calculation_Groups__c.description: Specifies all calculation groups that are relevant for the calculation step.

cgcloud__Calculation_Schema__c.description: Reference to the calculation schema record.

cgcloud__Constraint_User_Exit_Id__c.description: Unique identifier for a user exit that represents a constraint for the required calculation step.

cgcloud__Interim_Value__c.description: Auxiliary variable that can be used to either store the result of the step (Copy) or sum up the current item value (carry over) as interim value.

cgcloud__Item_Meta_Rule__c.description: Specifies how the rules apply to the order item template.

cgcloud__Mandatory__c.description: Defines whether a calculation step is mandatory. If no matching condition records are found, the calculation stops with an error message.

cgcloud__Position__c.description: Position of the calculation step within the calculation schema.

cgcloud__Pricing_Condition_Template__c.description: Reference to the pricing condition template.

cgcloud__Print_Relevant__c.description: Specifies whether the calculation step is print relevant.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the calculation schema step record.

cgcloud__Selectable_Promotion_Skip__c.description: Skip the calculation step for an item that originates from a selectable promotion.

cgcloud__Statistical__c.description: Defines whether the calculation step is a statistical step.

cgcloud__Step_Constraint__c.description: Defines a constraint for the calculation step. If the constraint isn't fulfilled, the calculation step is skipped.

cgcloud__Step_Reference__c.description: Defines the calculation steps that are used as a basis of the current calculation step.

cgcloud__Step__c.description: Position of the calculation step within the calculation schema.

cgcloud__Target_Condition__c.description: Specification of either the line item attribute or sales document attribute that receives the value of the found condition.

cgcloud__Target_Result__c.description: Specification of either the line item attribute or sales document attribute that receives the result of the current calculation step.

cgcloud__User_Exit_Id__c.description: Unique identifier for the user exit of the calculation step.
